lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Sales

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: especially in areas of south america that i have visited, i am aware of the needs that families have and the financial obstacles they are faced with. i want to help those families get roofs over their heads and food for their children. that applies to all areas of the world, not just south america
lender.occupational_info: i am a full time student majoring in English with a focus on Literature. i want to be a teacher. i especially love the outdoors (backpacking, rock climbing, etc) and take every chance i get to spend time in the back country. my favorite books are Catcher in the Rye and A Clockwork Orange.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: it feels good to give, to those who need!

lender.name: Curtis & Katie
lender.loan_because: SIFE wants to help struggling businesses succeed.

lender.name: Lene
lender.occupation: Stay at home mum to three boys
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to an individual. Sometimes all it takes is someone to give you a chance to make your life better for yourself and your family. I want to be able to give someone with that chance.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.occupational_info: I teach Science (Biology) to high school students!

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: what good is money doing sitting in a bank account.
lender.occupational_info: IT consultant

lender.name: Maureen & Joe
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have been blessed with a long and successful life. It is a privilege to share with others. Giving is its own reward!
lender.occupational_info: I am employed by our public library for almost twenty years. My specific job is Internet based loans of books, etc. and maintenance of our computer systems. My husband is a retired educator.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I can. And since I can, I must. Simple. I mean. I helped somebody buy a freakin' goat. How cool is that?
lender.occupational_info: I play "Let's pretend" in front of a camera and they give me money. Makes no logical sense, but who am I to argue?

lender.name: Emanuel
lender.loan_because: I want to share my Blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: retired U. S. Navy

lender.name: Blaine
lender.loan_because: It helps just a little.
lender.occupational_info: I am a counselor of sorts who assists others in changing their lives in ways that empower them.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love God and God loves the poor.

lender.name: Gwen
lender.loan_because: I've been in need of help in the past and it's an honour to be able to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a pulp mill. My job is to solve problems with the process and equipment.

lender.name: Janor
lender.loan_because: I wanted to loan because their are so many needy people her in the Philippines that cannot afford to pay their medical bills and medication to alleviate their health. the money that I will borrowed her will be also be offered to them for their immediate assistance during emergency, and make them pay later the amount used in a specified length of time to lessen the difficulty of paying it. Part of the money loaned here will also be used in the Orphanage center memorizing the Qur'an. And half of the money will be invested in agriculture and Internet cafe to insure the repayment of amount loaned in the specified length of time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Guidance Counselor in a Private School, I am also active in various organization and foundation that give good services for the welfare of the people in the Phil. I wanted also to start a business to make our org. and foundation self-supporting in giving services to the needy people.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I have benefited from investments strangers have made in me.
lender.occupational_info: I push around a lot of paper :)

lender.name: Randy Ford
lender.loan_because: Can one person change the world ? No. But if a small group worked together, Someone else's world might change.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: A loan of $50, which seems small to us, is a relatively substantial amount of money in other parts of the world. By loaning this money, and with the recipient's hard work, people can rise out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am in grad school, researching global climate change.

lender.name: Avanti
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurship is empowering!

lender.name: ndianabasi
lender.occupational_info: capital market trader/ domainer

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: It's necessary for me to do my part in the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a traveling teacher who loves to help people understand and learn new topics in the U.S.A. !!

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: My daughter and I working to help others to help themselves.. Give a man a fish.....

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I believe we can all make a difference one day at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families who are struggling with emotional, psychosocial and behaviourial problems.

lender.name: The Haba Family
lender.loan_because: we want to help others help themselves and those in their community.
lender.occupational_info: Craig helps develop and bring to market new surgical devices designed to improve patient outcomes. LeAnne is a very active mom to our two children, Olivia and Alex, who are both in elementary school.

lender.name: rik
lender.occupational_info: I sell and service automatic lubrication systems for mining and construction equipment. In addition to sales I operate a small machine shop.

lender.name: Ms. R.S.
lender.loan_because: I have spent this much money on frivolous things. This is so worthwhile!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a parts manufacturing plant. We make parts for Automobiles and for Heavy Equipment.

lender.name: El Mano
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of people being given the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Current full time husband & father of two. Also, a former adhesive chemist, plant manager and production accountant.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I love to give gifts..why not give something to a stranger?
lender.occupational_info: I go to college 15 hours a week to learn important lessons for my future career. To pay for my loans I have for college I work about 20 hours a week at a local store.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: it is my honor to!

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: We can help each other this way.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It feels great to be able to help people become successful and grow their economy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Colorado State University and I also work at a hotel.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make the life they dream of.
lender.occupational_info: i make movies.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.occupational_info: I work for Habitat for Humanity. We build houses for families that work hard but cannot afford one. We give them a zero interest mortgage so that they can purchase the house.

lender.name: Gayla
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a good life and a wonderful family. Each of my loans has been made to commemorate some personal success or happy moment. For example, my youngest daughter graduated from college in May. One way I celebrated that event was to help someone else reach their goal with another loan. It is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small nonprofit hospital. My job is to spread the word about our services in order to improve the health of our community.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have good friends who love me and who are there for me. I would like to be able to be that person for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a computer most of the day, although I have a lot of interaction wtih people. I love the company I work for and the people I work with. They make my job fun. Although it can sometimes boring, most of the time it is challenging and very busy.... just depends on the day.

lender.name: Kristie
lender.loan_because: I have so much opportunity available to me in my life, and these loans, regardless of size, can make a positive impact on the lives of others. I think it is very exciting to help people improve their lives!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time mom of Jake (8), Chloe (5) and Kaia (1).

lender.name: Jared J
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit!

lender.name: Annah-Marie
lender.loan_because: this organization is amazing.

lender.name: LiberalReaders
lender.loan_because: We are a book group who got inspired to make a Kiva loan after reading "Banker to the Poor". Since we are a group of women we decided to make a loan to a group of women and chose a group in Uganda. Since our original loan we have made 3 more, also to groups of women, in various parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are an eclectic group that includes teachers, lawyers, nurses, CPAs, business women, retirees, and stay at home moms,

lender.name: Luke and Vanessa
lender.loan_because: We want to help people that are trying to break the cycle of poverty.

lender.name: Luis Orellana Ê¨ßÈôÜÂ•ï

lender.occupational_info: Advisory Board for The Linden Center http://bit.ly/Azg6t a non profit school for children and adolescents with behavior and mental problems.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I loan because i was helped and one good turn deserves another... I heard about Kiva on Oprah and think it's one of the most brilliant and clever ways to help others. Thank you
lender.occupational_info: I worked in a hospital as a nurse for about 5 years and now stay home and raise my children, while my husband works

lender.loan_because: WE HAVE A RESPONSABILITY TO TAKE ACTION!!!!!!!!

lender.loan_because: I've found that it's a passionof mine to help others, specifically others in need of help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a movie theatre. Occasionally I sell the tickets, but mainly I count the money that we made throughout the day

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to help people reach their goals, and I love people with an entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an MBA student with a marketing and tech background.

lender.name: Sandu
lender.loan_because: I want to grow my business.

lender.name: Gabe

lender.name: carien bitar-boerboom
lender.loan_because: I CAN
lender.occupational_info: Working always working

lender.name: Levi
lender.loan_because: Jesus loves everyone. So why should I be blessed more than someone in another country, simply because I was born here? I guess I just want to show Jesus love to people all over the world by blessing them with the money he gave me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Christian and a follower of Jesus, so my only job is to make his love and truth known. Other than that, I am currently in college, so I don't have any real job except learning.

lender.loan_because: Need Some Money to develop my business. Field of my business is Internet Cafe
lender.occupational_info: Manage Internet Cafe business...

lender.loan_because: we need to give back. We are given so much in our lives - the least we can do is help others who have not been afforded this opportunity.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping entrepreneurs around the world - and keeping in touch with their success.
lender.occupational_info: I import commercial furniture and sell it in Australia and New Zealnd

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I figure since God invests in my dreams everyday, I should also invest in others.

lender.loan_because: we want to help people achieve their goals.

lender.name: Bj√∏rnar

lender.occupational_info: I'm a student consultant at a university in Oslo, Norway. I work at the Institute of psychology.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful opportunity. Thank you Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I test printer software.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: It changes the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in dental school and will work as a dentist when I graduate. I go to school for 8 hours a day and usually study at home 2-6 hours a night. I live with my wife and 2 dogs and we like to travel in our free time.

lender.name: Dawn & Mitch
lender.loan_because: To enrich ourselves.

lender.name: Tammie
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is important to help people who want to work hard to make a better life for themselves and their family. I have been a single parent for 10 years, work two jobs, and know how difficult it can be to get ahead. Sometimes you just need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in getting health care services and understanding their insurance benefits.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: a little help from alot of people can dramatically change a person's life!
lender.occupational_info: I teach psychology classes at the local university, and also breed/show Portuguese Water Dogs

lender.name: gina
lender.occupational_info: I find authors to write college textbooks, and edit the books that they write.

lender.name: Roxana
lender.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is expected." While I would not say I have been given much, it's all relative. Compared to the majority of the world I am very rich indeed, and blessed.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Khymberlee
lender.loan_because: I am able to. I have been helped so many times in my life and I want to show my gratitude.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to help people heal.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs somebody to believe in them.

lender.name: Harshal
lender.loan_because: "Poverty is the worst form of violence" - Gandhi

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: Political organizations are not effectively helping those in need. We need to take responsibility for each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college professor and have the opportunity to actively touch lives and at times make a difference.

lender.name: Dorapalli
lender.loan_because: I need a loan because I want to start a detergent powder making unit for the poor tribal women around me who are suffering without food and basic needs. To set up this unit I need $650.
lender.occupational_info: As a woman I can understand the problems of women. I live in a small village called Kothapatnam in Andhra Pradesh state in India. My husband is a pastor and a social worker. There are lot of tribal women around our house. Their main occupation is fishing. Men go on fishing. Women stay back at home without any work. They don't have any other source of income except the money comes from the fish that was caught by their husbands. I have seen people sleeping without food as they don't get much income everyday. By seeing all the problems of these women I was moved in my heart and have thought of starting an income generating project i.e detergent powder making unit to help these poor malnourished women with some additional income to feed themselves.

lender.name: carolina
lender.loan_because: one hand wash the other hand

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: everyone should have access to the tools and funds needed to succeed in living their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: We buy and sell music instruments, sheet music and accessories. We work closely with local musicians and teachers to coordinate lessons and instructional clinics as well as performances to share our love of music with the community.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to make a difference in the world, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am studying for the bar exam so that I can get licensed as an attorney and (hopefully) practice non-profit law.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Being able to assist someone in helping themselves to a better quality of life gives me a great deal of satisfaction and fulfillment!

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because:
Microfinance has the capability to change individual lives, families, and entire economies.
Through my travels, I have seen abject poverty first-hand, as well as the positive effects of microfinance loans.
I have been blessed beyond measure, and it is the least I can do to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Global Macro Analyst for investment advisory firm

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: To assist women and their children who live in hunger and illiteracy, or under unequal legal systems.

lender.name: Joellen Victoria
lender.loan_because: I can, so why not?

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: Currently help in the conversion of microelectronics to lead-free solder. Striving to engineer and promote alternative fuel technologies.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: THERE IS A PLACE WHERE THE SIDEWALK ENDS-BEFORE THE STREET BEGINS.

lender.name: Grateful Grandchildren
lender.loan_because: We are six grandchildren who have chosen to honor our Grandma Eleanor by making a loan in her name to one of Kiva's entrepreneurs. We plan to keep the loan rotating -- a gift that keeps giving, just like our grandmother.

lender.name: Whitney
lender.loan_because: Working for Children International I see first hand what a difference one sponsor can make for the child and their family. I recently discovered Kiva and I was impressed with the certain sponsorship program they offer. Its all a great way to make a difference around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Working with Children International involves a one on one relationship with our sponsors to help better the lives of the children they sponsor. From letters, emails, memos, packages, financial aspects, finding children for sponsorship and even travel...working here is a wonderful experience with a huge responsibility.

lender.name: Debby
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: it is an amazing opportunity to give to someone who deserves it!
lender.occupational_info: I am learning to be a pharmacist.

lender.name: Paradise Found Yoga
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good and it can make a real in difference in someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to heal themselves through breath, food and physical exercise

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give. ~Sir Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: I help groups of people work together in order to complete a job.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: together we WILL help change the world.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I like people and would like to help make a difference.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: lives can be changed my the smallest of gestures

lender.name: Tlaryth
lender.loan_because: The greatest thing anyone can do is make a positive difference in the life if another person. If doing this can make a small difference then I will keep doing it and maybe we all may stand a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I respond with police and other similar first responder organizations when there is a bad chemical spill or anything else that is hazardous appears and I help clean up.

lender.name: Peaceful World
lender.loan_because: We want to support individuals and groups all over the world who are working to raise their standard of living through entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: Peaceful World Conversations is an organization that initiates conversations of peace and peacekeeping domestically and internationally. We do that by gathering together groups of diverse individuals to speak of their various life experiences creating a framework for empathy and compassion as we view life through another's perspective.

lender.loan_because: Just want to help!

lender.name: Christopher

lender.occupational_info: I currently teach investing and energy courses at the MBA level. Before I retired I was involved in the investment business with a pension fund.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I have had a small business for over thirteen years now. I remember both the excitement and the worries at the beginning. I hope that I can help in a small way for someone else to follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect and enhance trees and gardens in urban areas.

lender.loan_because: it's improving the relationship between the high tech countries in the EU and 3th world countries. Donating money to several foundations don't help much in compared to distrube loans directly to the poor people.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: My school that I teach at has a social justice focus. We have a partnership that is developing with Kip Keino High School in Kenya. We as a class that is going to be together for 4 years are looking to find ways to be connected to people in Kenya.

lender.name: Dynara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves. I believe we can all make an impact through micro-loans by donating a small amount of money to sponsor entrepreneurs in second and third world countries. This fund will allow them to develop their own business and help them sustain their economic growth.
lender.occupational_info: Compassion is what enables us to relate to one another despite the differences in our appearance, status, wealth, personal view, or conviction. True compassion allows us to eradicate those barriers and look at people as People. We are all human beings, we all share the same desire to pursue happiness in our lives; we all want food on our table and a roof over our head; and we all want freedom from suffering. If we can reflect on this thought for a little bit, and realize that we are, in essence, One and the same, I truly believe we all have the power to help one another and act on our compassion.
